code: import{ADD_TASK,REMOVE_TASK,INCREASE_PRIORTY,DECREASE_PRIORITY}from'../../constants';export var addTask=function addTask(id,description,executor,priority){return{type:ADD_TASK,id:id,description:description,executor:executor,priority:priority};};export var removeTask=function removeTask(id){return{type:REMOVE_TASK,id:id};};export var increasePriority=function increasePriority(id){return{type:INCREASE_PRIORTY,id:id};};export var decreasePriority=function decreasePriority(id){return{type:DECREASE_PRIORITY,id:id};};
